title: Engg student murder in Ahmednagar: Accused dug pit to bury woman a day before abducting her, say police
selftext:
TL:DR Pune: Bhagyashree was kidnapped & murdered by fellow college student Shivam Fulawale & his aides Suresh Ramesh Jadhav
- All three arrested

they kiIIed Girl & to mislead Police, sent message 'Allah Haafiz' to her parents for ransom

- they burnt her body with petroI & then buried her in the ground
